name: Stargazing (TunyFox)
description:
A game for pygame that I created in early 2021 as an assignment in school.
Uploaded to itch.io so classmates etc. can try it out.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Language used:   Python3
Time spent:           8-10h
Music used:          Sunrise Avenue: I don't dance instrumental (edited!)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
All textures (except the character and the moon!) are made by me. 
I may make it playable in the browser in the future, who knows.

- All donations will be spent for studying materials and/or for a Caramell latte -
